title: Cherry Hour : Concept Brand Identity
description: A minimal and premium coffee brand concept built around the ritual of "coffee time." The identity combines a cherry, clock, and coffee cup to symbolize flavour, timing, and experience. The project includes logo construction, typography selection, color system, and packaging application, demonstrating end-to-end brand development from idea to visual execution.

title: Prospects App Identity Concept
description: A future-focused app identity built around the idea of growth and foresight. The logo combines a crystal ball and upward arrow to symbolize predictive insight and progress. The project includes icon development, color system, typography selection, and mockup applications across digital touchpoints.
